description: The main male protagonist. A 13 year-old boy who is spending his summer vacation in his grandfather`s house. When he met http://anidb.net/ch5462 [Arashi] from the first time, he established a connection with her when he touched her hand, and since then the duo gained the power to travel back and forth in time. He is infatuated with http://anidb.net/ch5462 [Arashi]`s beauty and kindness, but is afraid to convey his feelings to her.
name: Yasaka Hajime
